laravel11Changes.description: Streamlined application structure with fewer default files
laravel11Changes.details: Laravel 11 removes several default files and middleware, making the initial structure cleaner

laravel11Changes.description: API routes are now optional and not included by default
laravel11Changes.details: You need to explicitly install API routes using php artisan install:api
AppServiceProvider is now the primary service provider, others are optional
Many middleware are now optional and can be added as needed
bootstrap/app.php now uses a fluent builder pattern for configuration

laravel12Changes.description: Laravel 12 is a minimal-breaking maintenance release
laravel12Changes.details: Focused on dependency updates and stability improvements
Updated dependencies to work with PHP 8.4 features
Improved Breeze and Jetstream with better defaults

general.why: Application cannot connect to database without proper credentials
general.correctApproach: Always configure DB_CONNECTION, DB_DATABASE, DB_USERNAME, and DB_PASSWORD in .env file

general.why: Laravel uses APP_KEY for encryption and sessions
general.correctApproach: Run php artisan key:generate after installation

general.why: Increases deployment size and potential security risks
Exposes sensitive credentials and environment-specific configuration

general.mistake: Not using environment variables for sensitive data
general.correctApproach: Always use env() helper for sensitive configuration

general.title: Use Environment Variables
general.description: Store all environment-specific and sensitive configuration in .env
general.reasoning: Keeps configuration separate from code, improves security

general.title: Follow PSR-12 Coding Standards
general.description: Use consistent code formatting and naming conventions

general.title: Use Eloquent ORM
general.description: Prefer Eloquent over raw SQL queries
general.reasoning: Provides security (SQL injection protection), readability, and maintainability

general.title: Implement Proper Error Handling
general.description: Use try-catch blocks and return appropriate HTTP status codes
general.reasoning: Provides better user experience and easier debugging

general.title: Write Tests
general.description: Write feature and unit tests for critical functionality
general.reasoning: Catches bugs early, enables confident refactoring
